portfolio.title: Lamp Store
portfolio.description: I developed this shopping cart using Figma for UI/UX design and implemented it with JavaScript, React, CSS, HTML, Node.js, and Context API.

portfolio.title: Currency Conversion
portfolio.description: I developed a currency converter application using React, CSS, and HTML. It provides real-time currency rates for precise conversions among 100+ currencies.

portfolio.title: GitHub Dashbord
portfolio.description: Developed a GitHub Dashboard using Python and Django, featuring a Pygal-based dashboard style format.
